Our Team: Staff / Board Members ‚Äì The British Home in California Skip to content Contact Us Jobs Admins Home About Us Our Team: Staff / Board Members Donors and Ways to Give Volunteer Opportunities History of the British Home The Cottages Admissions & Amenities Admissions Rates FAQs Events Public Events Friends & Family Activities Celebrations Ingathering DBE Ordinary people doing EXTRAORDINARY
things. Our Team: Staff / Board Members ‚ÄúOrdinary people doing extraordinary things‚Äù the British Home staff and board are dedicated to the mission and vision of our splendid Home. The warm, caring atmosphere of ‚Äúhome‚Äù generated throughout the British Home‚Äôs campus is in large part due to our staff, many who have served for a number of years, and create a natural, warm, personal connection with our resident family. Staff are given excellent training and the opportunity to improve and grow. ¬†They all work full time and some have been with us for 5, 10, or even 20 years. Volunteering to serve on the Home‚Äôs board are citizens who genuinely care about eldercare, and appreciate that retirement living is a new beginning and one of life‚Äôs milestone decisions to be taken deliberately by all concerned parties. Our Staff Departments Include: Administration Dietary Nursing Housekeeping Activities Maintenance The Executive Board and Directors The British Home Board is made up of the Executive¬†Board¬†and eight directors. Download Fact Sheet Request Brochure Download Brochure We have lots of activities scheduled every month, for every type of participant! Download Event Calendar Download Weekly Menu Volunteer for The British Home Today! Volunteer Today! Donors and Ways to Give Memorial Request Form Newspapers Queen Elizabeth - Spectrum News The British Home in California, Ltd.  |  647 Manzanita Ave., Sierra Madre, CA 91024  |  License #191501668

Who We Are | Americantaproomsg top of page Home Who We Are Beers Food ATR Rewards Beer Geek Speaks Contact More... Use tab to navigate through the menu items. ABOUT AMERICAN TAPROOM A SIMPLE IDEA American Taproom was founded by three beer enthusiasts with more than 30 years experience running busy bars, bustling restaurants, and active beer retail and distribution businesses. ¬†We aren‚Äôt just in the beer bar business, we are in the beer business from nose to tail and we can‚Äôt wait for you to love beer as much as we do! We realized this passion by recognizing the critical importance of proper beer service, and how this comes to our customers through a team of servers with the knowledge, the love of each and every beer on tap to keep, pour, and serve not only great beer but a great beer experience! Each and every one of our servers behind the bar is a Certified Beer Server (Level 1), certified by the Cicerone Certification Program. ¬†American Taproom also has 2 of the only 6 Certified Cicerones (Level 2) in Singapore to help curate the selection, and ensure you‚Äôre experiencing beer at its best! Bar Manager/Founder Johnny Christensen | Level 2 Certified Cicerone Coming from an extensive F&B and craft beer background in the US, Johnny is one out of the six Certified Cicerones that can be found in Singapore. He is the main figure that oversees operations at American Taproom. Johnny is also the owner of the retail craft beer store, Beer Force, that is located in¬†Holland Village. Our Locations American Taproom, Stanley 2 Stanley St Singapore 068721 ‚Äã +65 8809 1974 American Taproom, Geylang 71/73 Geylang Road Singapore 389195 ‚Äã +65 8181 4267 American Taproom, Waterloo 261 Waterloo Street, #01-23 Singapore 180261 ‚Äã +65 9632 1570 Operating Hours *Our hours may vary depending on how busy we are. Please give us a call/WhatsApp us to confirm before you visit, especially near closing hours! Monday - Thursday: 11.30am - 11.00pm Friday & Saturday: 11.30am - 12:00am Sunday: Closed Monday - Wednesday: 3pm - 12am Thursday - Sunday: 11:30am - 12am Monday - Sunday 12 noon - 12:00am info@americantaproom.com.sg ¬© 2025 Copyright - American Taproom. All Rights Reserved. bottom of page

Spotlight Shines On BB's Pourhouse: Adding Flair to Downtown Clermont | South Lake Tablet Facebook Instagram Front Page Features News The South Lake Community Churches and Fellowship Clubs Community Organizations Obituaries Pets Schools Sports/Wellness Sports Wellness Business Events Upcoming Events Weekly Meetings Fundraisers Concerts and Theater Calendar of Events Submit Your Event FREE SUBSCRIPTION South Lake Business Directory Search South Lake Tablet Front Page Features News The South Lake Community Churches and Fellowship Clubs Community Organizations Obituaries Pets Schools Sports/Wellness Sports Wellness Business Events Upcoming Events Weekly Meetings Fundraisers Concerts and Theater Calendar of Events Submit Your Event FREE SUBSCRIPTION South Lake Business Directory [pro_ad_display_adzone id="510"] Business Front Page Spotlight Shines On BB‚Äôs Pourhouse: Adding Flair to Downtown Clermont May 7, 2024 BB‚Äôs Pourhouse, the latest addition to Clermont‚Äôs downtown scene, officially opened its doors to the public on May 3rd. Situated at 756 W. Montrose St, within the Art Walk location, the taproom promises to be a game-changer for beer and wine enthusiasts seeking a novel drinking experience. BB‚Äôs Pourhouse stands as a complementary companion to the Black Bear Kitchen. Through new technology, guest can choose from a wide selection of beers and wines, and manage their drinks and pour sizes in a do-it-yourself experience‚Ä¶..no server! A corridor leads from Black Bear Kitchen to BBs Pour House. The ribbon-cutting ceremony for BBs Pourhouse and Black Bear Kitchen was presided over by the South Lake Chamber of Commerce. The event symbolized a warm welcome to the business community. Experience the fusion of tradition and innovation. For further information, contact BB‚Äôs Pourhouse at +1 863-242-3530 or visit their web at BBs Pourhouse. Everyone is invited to attend to hear great guest speakers, meet candidates and learn about issues that affect us all. Our next meeting is February 8, 2023. Sign up at: mobilize.us/LakeCountyDEC/event/544981 Facebook.com/4CCDC or Twitter.com/$CCDemClub. About Us | Pour Tap House HOME EVENTS ON TAP MENU ON TAP COCKTAILS SPIRITS TO GO BEER AND COCKTAILS WINE, CANS, GLUTEN FREE SODAS, N/A, SNACKS ABOUT CONTACT Get in touch 555-555-5555 info@pourtaphouse.com EVENTS ON TAP MENU ON TAP COCKTAILS SPIRITS TO GO BEER AND COCKTAILS WINE, CANS, GLUTEN FREE SODAS, N/A, SNACKS ABOUT CONTACT CONTACT US ABOUT POUR TAP HOUSE Mission Our mission is to provide the community an exceptional environment to socialize, relax and interact with one another while enjoying a wide selection of beers, craft seasonal cocktails, and an envious selection of bourbon ‚Ä¶ one "Pour" at a time. Who We Are Pour is a craft beer tap house with 30 draft lines focusing on the best beer we can source. We feature local, national, and global breweries on constant rotation. Our high-end whiskey selection features the world's best distilleries. We also have a passion for creating perfectly-crafted cocktails. We've been nominated for best cocktails in Denver and make one of the best Old Fashioned's in Colorado. Feel free to talk to any of our bartenders about your pallet preferences for a beer or cocktail recommendation. Food isn't our specialty so we allow you to bring your favorite food in, or dine from one of the quality food trucks we invite to our neighborhood almost nightly. We look forward to seeing you at Pour and will gladly host any type of social gathering you can dream up. Contact us to inquire about renting our mezzanine or entire bar to host your event. What People are saying.... Something for Everyone " Pour Tap House truly has a wide variety of beers, especially styles of beer from so many local breweries (not just the crowd favorites). They also have an extensive bourbon and whisky list, plus killer cocktails. Meaning there is actually something for everyone " - Liv R MashIt Hidden Gem " I found this little Gem.... Great selection of local beers. Great Bourbon selection. Mary was a sweet, cute and interesting person. They open the garage door and the breeze came in and it was amazing. If you have a few hours of spend before you go to the airport, this is your spot. " - Bruno FabuFit Cool Little Spot " A cool little spot for drinks, came here with my brother and his friend. I ordered a old fashion and a whiskey sour I forgot the name. Delicious drinks and well priced. " - Anton YesSuits Opening HOURS OPEN HOURS Mon - Wed 4:00 pm - 10:00 pm Thursday 4:00 pm - 11:00 pm Friday 2:00 pm - 12:00 am Saturday 1:00 pm - 12:00 am Sunday 1:00 pm - 9:00 pm HOME EVENTS ON TAP MENU ON TAP COCKTAILS SPIRITS TO GO BEER AND COCKTAILS WINE, CANS, GLUTEN FREE SODAS, N/A, SNACKS ABOUT CONTACT PRIVACY POLICY NAVIGATION ¬© 2025 All Rights Reserved | Pour Tap House ADDRESS 720-460-1611 info@pourtaphouse.com 12433 E 104th Place #102 Commerce City, CO 80022 Website by Bryt‚Ä¢Idea Consulting LLC CONNECT Are a Loyalty member? Read More BJ's Restaurants, Inc. (BJ's) owns and operates 103 restaurants located in 13 states (California, Texas, Arizona, Colorado, Oregon, Nevada, Florida, Ohio, Oklahoma, Kentucky, Indiana, Louisiana and Washington) as March 4, 2011. BJ's restaurants operate either as a BJ's Restaurant & Brewery, which includes a brewery within the restaurant, a BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse, which receives the beer it sells from one of its breweries or an approved contract brewer of its recipe beers (contract brewer), or a BJ's Pizza & Grill, which is a smaller format, full-service restaurant with a more limited menu than its other restaurants. The Company's menu features its deep-dish pizza, its own handcrafted beers, as well as a selection of appetizers, entrees, pastas, sandwiches, specialty salads and desserts, including its Pizookie dessert. Its BJ's Restaurant & Brewery restaurants feature in-house brewing facilities where BJ's handcrafted beers are produced for some of its restaurants.
